name: SCP: Recontainment
description:
Experience singleplayer and multiplayer initial containments, terminations and encounters with many of the SCP Foundation's scariest and most mysterious SCPs.

SCP: Recontainment is structured into different game modes giving a broad view of different multiplayer and singleplayer SCP scenarios.

With currently over 30 SCPs, we aim to have the most comprehensive and ambitious SCP experience to date.

Features:

  • Containment Breach: Singleplayer, Co-op and Multiplayer Containment Breach based on the original game by Undertow Games.
  • Random Facilities: Our facility generator gives a new experience every time you play.
  • Facility Creator: Create, design and play your own custom facilities in game using our facility editor.
  • Community Map Sharing: Share your custom facilities with the world using the in game facility browser.
  • Multiplayer Scenarios: Experience the best scenarios that SCP has to offer with up to 30 players per game.
  • Singleplayer Experiences: Take on story based horror experiences.
  • Frequent Content: New content will be frequently added based on community polls.
  • Community Focussed: An active development team that puts the community first.

Current Game Modes:

  • Multiplayer Containment Breach (Up to 30 Players)
  • Singleplayer Containment Breach
  • D Class Riot (Up to 15 Players)
  • SCP 096 Termination (Up to 5 Players)
  • Singleplayer SCP 087 Exploration IV
  • SCP 575 Initial Containment (Up to 5 Players)

Planned Game Modes:

  • SCP 682 Containment (Up to 30 Players)
  • SCP 860-1 Experiment (Up to 15 Players)
  • Singleplayer SCP 860-1 D Class Debrief
  • SCP 354 Outbreak (Up to 5 Players)
  • SCP 106 Containment (Up to 5 Players)
  • Intelligence Raid (Up to 15 Players)
  • SCP 024 - The Death Game (Up to 15 Players)

(Many more game modes will be added. These are the modes we have planned internally)
